thread.title: 'Bigg Boss 9' Day 15: Trouble brewing between Prince and Mandana?
thread.title_full: 'Bigg Boss 9' Day 15: Trouble brewing between Prince and Mandana? - Entertainment

author: A Correspondent
title: 'Bigg Boss 9' Day 15: Trouble brewing between Prince and Mandana?
text:
In today's episode of 'Bigg Boss 9', Mandana Karimi snaps at Prince Narula after which he is seen avoiding her. Is all not well between Prince and Mandana? Read to find out
This weekend, Salman Khan was seen bursting the bubble of the contestants by showing them the real side and how they are being percieved outside. This creates ripples inside the Bigg Boss house and also affects housemates’ interpersonal relationships.

Kishwer Merchantt, Suyyash Rai and Prince Narula 
Aman Verma is seen discussing the ‘trio’ Suyyash Rai, Kishwer Merchantt and Prince Narula who are ganging up against the rest of the house.

Vikas Bhalla breaks down after reading a letter from his wife 
Meanwhile, Vikas Bhalla breaks down after he gets a surprise letter from his wife as a birthday gift. (View more pics) 
Next day, the housemates wake up to the peppy number ‘Dill Bole Shik Dum’ and for the first time ever Rimi Sen is seen joining in the morning dance ritual.

'Bigg Boss 9' housemates 
Kishwer and Prince are seen discussing how Rochelle Rao and Mandana Karimi appeared disappointed when Rimi received ‘Ticket to Finale’. Kishwer also feels that Mandana has started aping Rimi’s mannerisms in the hope of becoming everyone’s favourite when she keeps saying ‘Mujhe Ghar Jana Hai’.
Third week into the show, the housemates are now beginning to explore their individuality by voicing their opinions and standing up for themselves. Rochelle apologises to Yuvika for calling her fake.

Yuvika Chaudhary 
Mandana snaps at Prince when he asks her to clean up the mess after she finishes the work. Agitated by Mandana’s comment, Prince gets Kishwer and Yuvika to his side and convinces them to speak up against people who try to showcase them in a bad light. Prince is also seen avoiding any conversation with Mandana.

Prince Narula 
Later in the day, the contestants gather in the nominations procedure. This time, they have to nominate contestants who have contributed least to the luxury budget task. Bigg Boss reiterates that Mandana and Keith are already nominated as they were chosen to be the worst performers. Unaffected by nominations, Keith rejoices the moment that he is spending with Rochelle and is soon seen singing the song ‘Hum Tum Ek Kamre Mei Bandh Ho’.

Rochelle Rao and Keith Sequeira 
Further Mandana feels guilty mistreating Prince and approaches him to sort out the differences.
As a captain, Kishwer is unhappy with Mandana’s less participation in household work and confronts her about the same. Mandana expresses her desire of breaking the unity between Prince, Suyyash and Kishwer as their groupism is majorly affecting the game.

Mandana Karimi 
Before the day comes to an end, Bigg Boss introduces an interesting activity where the contestants get to understand their fate (Bhavishyavani) from Bigg Boss Baba. But this opportunity was only given to the contestants who are not nominated. The Bhavishyavani task has a visible impact on the housemates as they get a reality check and also some guidance from Bigg Boss. The contestants go to bed with several thoughts lingering around in their heads.
It will be interesting if the contestants will finally coming out of their shell of pretense and follow their instincts in the third week of Bigg Boss Nau.
Who is your favourite contestant in 'Bigg Boss 9'? 
Catch a sneak-peek of 'Bigg Boss 9' Day 15
